name: Firm Capital Mortgage Investment Corporation 5.00% Convertible Unsecured Subordinated Debentures
longDescription: FCMIC investment objective is the Preservation of Shareholders Capital while providing share holders with a stable stream of monthly dividends from the Companys investments. The Company achieves its investment objectives by pursuing a strategy of growth through investments in selected niche markets that are under-serviced by large lending institutions. FCC as the Companys Mortgage Banker provides loan origination under writing loan servicing and syndication services.

fullAddress: 163 Cartwright Avenue,1244 Caledonia Road, Toronto, On, CA
